item.description:
As we have some 'regulars' this is being updated and changed. Also we're looking for new presenters - please email with ideas!!

Free hands-on workshop - Ten ways to promote your small business. A 90-minute workshop that outlines ways to share your products and services with relevant groups and potential buyers. Includes getting your message right, working with the press, setting up/using social media - including Twitter, LinkedIn, creating content, how to communicate effectively, and track your results. Starts at 5.45, finishes by 7.30pm.
item.how_to_find_us: Fourth Floor: Mustique. Please show ID, sign in and then head up to the fourth floor
item.name: **Please note change*** Ten Ways to Promote Your Business
